HomePage: /qa/portal/home This is your home page. Use this as a starting area to navigate across the portal. Use the tabs on the top to navigate you across different sections of the portal.
TrainingPage: /qa/portal/training This is the training page to manage your current training at the academy. The links on the page are as followed:
Feedback: For providing feedback for your trainer and to evaluate your experience at the academy
CVManagement: For viewing and editing your current CV
Reflection: For adding and viewing reflections on your progress at the academy
